EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Evolving DevOps: The Benefits of PaaS and Application Dial Tone_Q
EmailTemplate.subject: See you soon! Evolving DevOps: The Benefits of PaaS and Application Dial Tone today @ 10AM PST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
A friendly reminder of your registration for today's webinar "Evolving DevOps: The Benefits of PaaS and Application Dial Tone" at 10:00 AM PST. Please see the event details below:
Date: Wednesday, December 10, 2014 Time: 10:00AM PST (San Francisco) Event Number: 669 755 545 Join the Webex <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?d=669755545&t=a> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- US TOLL FREE: 1-855-749-4750 - Global call-in numbers <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=33226853&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 669 755 545
We look forward to you joining us, The Pivotal Team
